title: Handle a Customer's Railcar Release
description: A customer has finished unloading a railcar at their facility and is releasing it back to the railroad, making it empty and available for its next load.

tasks.description: Receive a notification from a customer, via a web portal or EDI, that a specific railcar is now empty and released.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system receives the release notification.

tasks.description: Update the status of the railcar in the system from 'At Customer' to 'Empty, Available for Pickup'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The car's status is correctly updated.

tasks.description: The system automatically creates a work order for a local train crew to go to the customer's facility and pull the empty car back to the yard.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new switching work order is generated.
